Vega.jl

A Julia package for generating visualizations in Vega

Visualization Modifying Functions

xlab! / ylab!
xlim! / ylim!
legend! (Add Title)
showlegend! / hidelegend!

View the Project on GitHubjohnmyleswhite/Vega.jl

xlab! / ylab!

Required Arguments:

v::VegaVisualization
title::String

This function mutates :VegaVisualization, adding/modifying a label of the X axis or Y axis.

Default Axis labels

using Vega

x = [1:100; 1:100]
y = [[1:100] + randn(100); 3.0 + 1.5 * [1:100] + randn(100)]
group = [[1 for i in 1:100]; [2 for i in 1:100]]

v = lineplot(x = x, y = y, group = group)

Modified Axis labels

xlab!(v, "Weight (kg)")
ylab!(v, "Height (cm)")
